definitions.definition: Having a less than fully functional limb , or injuries which prevent full mobility.
Having any difficulty or impediment which can be likened to a crippling injury.
examples: a crippled version of the software, lacking many features

main_definition: ( usually offensive ) Having a less than fully functional limb , or injuries which prevent full mobility.
secondary_definitions: ( informal ) Having any difficulty or impediment which can be likened to a crippling injury.
